metadata.description: tianzecn's curated collection of Claude Code plugins for modern full-stack development

plugins.name: frontend
plugins.description: Comprehensive frontend development toolkit with TypeScript, React 19, Vite, TanStack Router & Query v5, shadcn/ui. Features code-analysis integration via claudemem semantic search, session-based artifact isolation, LLM performance tracking, multi-model plan/code review, 13 focused skills, intelligent workflow detection, and Chrome DevTools MCP debugging.

plugins.name: code-analysis
plugins.description: Deep code investigation with claudemem v0.4.0 AST structural analysis. Features Code Analysis Commands, Multi-Agent Orchestration patterns, Workflow Templates, PageRank-based symbol importance, callers/callees dependency tracing. NEW: 深度思考命令用于多维度问题分析。

plugins.name: bun
plugins.description: Production-ready TypeScript backend development with Bun runtime. Includes specialized agents for backend development, API design, and DevOps. Features comprehensive best practices, tools integration (Biome, Prisma, Hono, Docker), testing workflows, and AWS ECS deployment guidance.

plugins.name: orchestration
plugins.description: Shared multi-agent coordination and workflow orchestration patterns for complex Claude Code workflows. Skills-only plugin providing proven patterns for parallel execution, dynamic model discovery, session-based workspaces, LLM performance tracking.

plugins.name: agentdev
plugins.description: Create, implement, and review Claude Code agents and commands with multi-model validation and LLM performance tracking. Full-cycle development workflow with intelligent plugin classification and marketplace publishing.

plugins.name: coding
plugins.description: AI 驱动的需求分析与 GitHub Issue 自动创建。完整的 Issue 驱动开发工作流：需求分析 → Issue修复 → 开发归档 → 提交推送。支持问题复现、根因分析、PR 创建和智能 Git 提交的完整流程。

plugins.name: superpowers
plugins.description: Core skills library for Claude Code: TDD, debugging, collaboration patterns, and proven techniques. By Jesse Vincent.

plugins.name: superpowers-chrome
plugins.description: Direct Chrome DevTools Protocol access via 'browsing' skill. 17 CLI commands + MCP mode. Zero dependencies, auto-starts Chrome. By Jesse Vincent.

plugins.name: elements-of-style
plugins.description: Writing guidance based on Strunk's The Elements of Style (1918). Clear, precise writing rules for documentation and prose. By Jesse Vincent.

plugins.name: episodic-memory
plugins.description: Semantic search for Claude Code conversations. Remember past discussions, decisions, and patterns. MCP server + auto-indexing. By Jesse Vincent.

plugins.name: superpowers-lab
plugins.description: Experimental skills for Claude Code: tmux-based interactive command automation for vim, git rebase -i, REPLs, and terminal UI tools. By Jesse Vincent.

plugins.name: superpowers-developing-for-claude-code
plugins.description: Skills and docs for Claude Code plugin development. 42 official documentation files + self-update mechanism + plugin creation workflows. By Jesse Vincent.

plugins.name: double-shot-latte
plugins.description: Stops 'Would you like me to continue?' interruptions. Uses Claude to judge whether Claude should continue working automatically. By Jesse Vincent.

plugins.name: notebooklm-skill
plugins.description: Query Google NotebookLM notebooks directly from Claude Code for source-grounded, citation-backed answers from Gemini. Browser automation, library management, persistent auth. By PleasePrompto.

plugins.name: skill-seekers
plugins.description: 自动将文档网站、GitHub 仓库、PDF 文件转换为 Claude AI 技能。17 个 MCP 工具，25 个预设配置。By yusufkaraaslan.

plugins.name: docs
plugins.description: 文档技能集合 - 包含 ShipAny 等产品的中文文档技能，帮助快速了解和使用相关产品。

plugins.name: feiskyer
plugins.description: feiskyer 的 Claude Code 技能集合 - 包含 Codex 自主执行、长期任务自动化、图像生成、YouTube 字幕提取、Kiro 交互式开发、Spec-Kit 规范驱动开发等 6 个专业技能。

plugins.name: claude-skills
plugins.description: Awesome Claude Skills Collection - 来自 ComposioHQ 的精选技能集合（27个技能），包含开发工具、商业营销、创意媒体、文档处理、生产力等多个领域的实用技能。
